main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a bright fiery object descending in Kettering, Ohio on August 29, 1967.
interesting points: The observer described the object as appearing to break up like a satellite,The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds,The object was reported as a fiery ball that seemed to slow down before disappearing, The observer initially thought it was a satellite,Indication of related sightings in the Dayton area on the same night.
witness description: The main witness is a civilian; they were accompanied by their sister, her husband, and two children.
